Replying to @jitendravyas 2018-08-30 10:07
@jitendravyas @NetlifyCMS The CMS is not optimised for mobile use. However it is essentially a UI to ease management of content in git. I've often used it in conjunction with going directly to my site source in @GitHub and used their mobile UI to make changes (which @Netlify automatically deploy)

Replying to @ 2018-08-24 21:36
@ThorstenPanknin @Netlify Any site on @Netlify can be given a build hook which is just a webhook that you hit with an HTTP POST to trigger a build and deployment. As a result, you can trigger builds from all sorts of events from across the web.
